Module index¶

Module for create datasets from distinct sources of data.

class ds.DataSetBuilder(name, dataset_path=None, test_folder_path=None, train_folder_path=None, transforms_row=None, transforms_global=None, transforms_apply=True, processing_class=None, train_size=0.7, valid_size=0.1, validator='cross', dtype='float64')[source]¶

Base class for dataset build. Get data from memory. create the initial values for the dataset.

Parameters:
  • name (string) – dataset’s name
  • dataset_path (string) – path where the datased is saved. This param is automaticly set by the settings.cfg file.
  • train_folder_path (string) – path to the data what you want to add to the dataset, automaticly split the data in train, test and validation. If you want manualy split the data in train and test, check test_folder_path.
  • test_folder_path (string) – path to the test data. If None the test data is get from train_folder_path.
  • transforms_global (list) – list of transforms for all row x column
  • transforms_row (list) – list of transforms for each row
  • transforms_apply (bool) – apply transformations to the data
  • processing_class (class) – class where are defined the functions for preprocessing data.
  • train_size (float) – value between [0, 1] who determine the size of the train data
  • valid_size (float) – value between [0, 1] who determine the size of the validation data
  • validator (string) – name of the method for extract from the data, the train data, test data and valid data
  • dtype (string) – the type of the data to save
add_transforms(transforms_global=None, transforms_row=None, processing_class=None, save=False)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • transforms_global (list) – list of global transforms to apply
  • transforms_row (list) – list of row transforms to apply
  • processing_class (class) – class of the row transforms
  • save (bool) – if true the dataset with the transforms is saved
build_dataset(data, labels, test_data=None, test_labels=None, valid_data=None, valid_labels=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • data (ndarray) – array of values to save in the dataset
  • labels (ndarray) – array of labels to save in the dataset
desfragment()[source]¶

Concatenate the train, valid and test data in a data array. Concatenate the train, valid, and test labels in another array. return data, labels

distinct_data()[source]¶

return the radio of distincts elements in the training data. i.e [1,2,3,4,5] return 5/5 [2,2,2,2,2] return 1/5

dtype_t(data)[source]¶
Parameters:data (narray) – narray to cast

cast the data to the predefined dataset dtype

get_processing_class_name()[source]¶

return the name of the processing class

info(classes=False)[source]¶
Parameters:classes (bool) – if true, print the detail of the labels

This function print the details of the dataset.

is_binary()[source]¶

return true if the labels only has two classes

labels_info()[source]¶

return a counter of labels

classmethod load_dataset(name, dataset_path=None, info=True, dtype='float64')[source]¶
Parameters:
  • name (string) – name of the dataset to load
  • dataset_path (string) – path where the dataset was saved
  • dtype (string) – cast the data to the defined type

dataset_path is not necesary to especify, this info is obtained from settings.cfg

md5()[source]¶

return the signature of the dataset in hex md5

num_features()[source]¶

return the number of features of the dataset

only_labels(labels)[source]¶
Parameters:labels (list) – list of labels

return a tuple of arrays with data and labels, the returned data only have the labels selected.

save()[source]¶

save the dataset in pickle format

score_train_test()[source]¶

return the score of separability between the train data and the test data.

shape¶

return the shape of the dataset

sparcity()[source]¶

return a value between [0, 1] of the sparcity of the dataset. 0 no zeros exists, 1 all data is zero.

subset(percentaje)[source]¶
Parameters:percentaje (float) – value between [0, 1], this value represent the size of the dataset to copy.

i.e 1 copy all dataset, .5 copy half dataset

to_df()[source]¶

convert the dataset to a dataframe

url()[source]¶

return the path where is saved the dataset

class ds.DataSetBuilderImage(name, image_size=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class for images dataset build. Get the data from a directory where each directory’s name is the label.

Parameters:image_size (int) – define the image size to save in the dataset

kwargs are the same that DataSetBuilder’s options

build_dataset()[source]¶

the data is extracted from the train_folder_path, and then saved.

class ds.DataSetBuilderFile(name, dataset_path=None, test_folder_path=None, train_folder_path=None, transforms_row=None, transforms_global=None, transforms_apply=True, processing_class=None, train_size=0.7, valid_size=0.1, validator='cross', dtype='float64')[source]¶

Class for csv dataset build. Get the data from a csv’s file.

from_csv(folder_path, label_column)[source]¶

  • label_column (string) – column’s name where are the labels
